oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Scouts build their own cabin, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A captioned photo, published in the Nashville Times (1940), about the Boy Scout Troop 58. They “built this cabin on Westlawn Drive, with the Scoutmaster, the committee and the Scouts doing all the work. It cost less than $200. Dan Kestner is the leader, and Ed Phelan is chairman of the committee.” Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Kestner, Dan; Phelan, Ed
Boy Scouts of America
